about_the_game:
Dismay is a first-person survival horror game that follows the story of a detective investigating an abandoned mansion. Discover clues, solve puzzles, and uncover the mysteries of the mansion. You must survive while being chased by a nearly invincible monster hiding in the shadows. Use your environment to hide from the monster trying to kill you and slow them down.

Story

In the remote mountains of New York State, a forest filled with unspeakable horrors waits for its next unlucky victim. A long-abandoned mansion that once belonged to a wealthy businessman who went missing from his home is the focus of several missing person cases. Detective Alaina McKinney travels to the nightmare forest to uncover the mystery of the forest and what happened to the lost people—her only hope of escaping lies with the terrible truth at the heart of the mansion.

Environment

The game is set inside a small, abandoned mansion. Explore the mansion to solve the mystery and discover what happened to the missing people. As you wander the lonely corridors and explore every inch of the mansion, you will learn about the mansion's dark secrets and uncover the fates of the missing souls.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains strong horror themes, gore (such as corpses), depictions of violence, and strong language.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 ／ AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 ／ AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
